abstract_summ: We have characterized the quantitative N-glycosylation profile on spike protein and interestingly, observed unexpected O-glycosylation modifications on the receptor binding domain (RBD) of spike protein subunit S1.We have characterized the quantitative N-glycosylation profile on spike protein and interestingly, observed unexpected O-glycosylation modifications on the receptor binding domain (RBD) of spike protein subunit S1.Herein, we report the glycosylation mapping on spike protein subunits S1 and S2 expressed on human cells through high resolution mass spectrometry.Herein, we report the glycosylation mapping on spike protein subunits S1 and S2 expressed on human cells through high resolution mass spectrometry.The spike protein is comprised of two protein subunits (S1 and S2), which together possess 22 potential N-glycosylation sites.
title_summ: Site-specific N-glycosylation Characterization of Recombinant SARS-CoV-2 Spike ProteinsDeducing the N- and O- glycosylation profile of the spike protein of novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2Deducing the N- and O- glycosylation profile of the spike protein of novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2Identification of 22 N-glycosites on spike glycoprotein of SARS-CoV-2 and accessible surface glycopeptide motifs: implications for vaccination and antibody therapeuticsAnalysis of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein glycan shield: implications for immune recognition
title_abstract_phrases: We have characterized the quantitative N-glycosylation profile on spike protein and interestingly, observed unexpected O-glycosylation modifications on the receptor binding domain (RBD) of spike protein subunit S1.We have characterized the quantitative N-glycosylation profile on spike protein and interestingly, observed unexpected O-glycosylation modifications on the receptor binding domain (RBD) of spike protein subunit S1.Analysis of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein glycan shield: implications for immune recognitionHere we have generated 3D structures of glycoforms of the spike (S) glycoprotein from SARS-CoV-2, based on reported 3D structures and glycomics data for the protein produced in HEK293 cells.Herein, we report the glycosylation mapping on spike protein subunits S1 and S2 expressed on human cells through high resolution mass spectrometry.Herein, we report the glycosylation mapping on spike protein subunits S1 and S2 expressed on human cells through high resolution mass spectrometry.
